en.title: [1Q 2025] Labour Productivity
en.description: Quarterly labour productivity, covering value added per hour worked or per worker, by economic activity.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly labour productivity metrics, with disaggregation by economic sector. The value added per worker grew by 2.2% year-on-year (3Q 2024: 2.4%) while the value added per hour worked grew by 1.2% (3Q 2024: 2.6%).

bm.title: [ST1 2025] Produktiviti Buruh
bm.description: Produktiviti buruh suku tahunan, merangkumi nilai ditambah per jam bekerja ataupun per pekerja, mengikut aktiviti ekonomi.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan indikator produktiviti buruh suku tahunan terkini, dengan pecahan mengikut sektor ekonomi. Nilai ditambah per pekerja meningkat sebanyak 2.2% dari tahun ke tahun (ST3 2024: 2.4%) manakala nilai ditambah per jam bekerja meningkat sebanyak 1.2% (ST3 2024: 2.6%).
